name: Target Clicker (Vimlark)
description:
This game was made in 7 days for the 8 Bits to Infinity Easy Jam.

Theme: No Enemies

Goal: Get 1,000,000 Total Tickets

Click to shoot the targets.
The higher on the screen the target is when it is destroyed the more tickets you get. 
Destroying targets over the ducks give a Multiplier.
Buying items from the shop cost tickets but does not take away from your total ticket count.

This game was finished up quickly so I was unable to complete ticket total saving. Your score will be reset if you leave the window. Sorry.
